EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Workshop. See event details below.
Date: Friday, 26 February 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 1:30 PM Location: Suntec City Guild House, Singapore
{{my.Save the date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/big-data-workshop/singapore]]>.
